## Bio

I am a current third-year Statistics and Data Science and Computational and Systems Biology double major at UCLA. My research interests include health disparities, disease etiology, and genomics. In the future, I hope to pursue a PhD in Biostatistics. Here is my [resume](docs/sang_resume.pdf).
